name: SuperClaude Performance
description: Performance optimization using two specialists â€” performance-engineer (profiling, critical-path analysis, caching strategy, bundle optimization, database tuning) and analyzer (root cause investigation, bottleneck identification, systematic debugging). Returns before/after benchmarks with targeted optimizations. Activates on "make this faster", "find the bottleneck", "p95 latency", "why is this slow".

permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_URL: URL of the SuperClaude bridge server that orchestrates multi-agent wave execution. Set to your self-hosted bridge URL.
permissionJustification.SUPERCLAUDE_BRIDGE_TOKEN: Shared authentication secret between OpenClaw and the bridge server. Prevents unauthorized agent execution.
